name: Alice
description: Wonderland is a Web3 metaverse that reimagines digital interaction by blending decentralized technologies, artificial intelligence, and immersive virtual environments. Built on the Solana blockchain, it creates a multidimensional ecosystem where users can: Participate in governance and shape the platform’s future. Own and trade digital assets, including land, wearables, and AI agents. Interact with advanced AI entities powered by Eliza OS. Create, explore, and monetize content in Hyperfy’s 3D virtual world. Wonderland is not just a game or social platform but an evolving digital universe where human creativity, AI autonomy, and blockchain ownership converge to enable agency, community, and economic opportunities.The ALICE token is the primary currency and governance token of the Wonderland ecosystem, a Web3 metaverse built on the Solana blockchain. It enables: Transactions: Purchasing virtual assets, commissioning AI agents, and accessing premium experiences. Governance: Voting on ecosystem development and policies. Staking and Rewards: Earning returns and incentivizing participation. Interoperability: Connecting Wonderland to the broader Web3 ecosystem. Solana’s high-performance blockchain ensures low-cost, near-instant transactions, making ALICE scalable and efficient for Wonderland’s tokenized economy.
